projects.name: Custom-made Mario AI Agent
projects.description: Created a Super Mario Bros clone using official assets, and mimicked the original physics as much as possible. Video is showing training process using a custom made training level.

projects.name: AI News Segment Generator
projects.description: Breaking news segment generator using OpenAI API for both ChatGPT and DALL-E. Dialogue is generated on the fly, and a funny image is created to (hopefully) match the story.

projects.name: Perfect Boxing Form Tutorial
projects.description: Utilized machine learning to train an agent to throw the most accurate and powerful punches imaginable (with perfect form of course).

projects.name: Raytracer
projects.description: Created a raytracer that can render very simple scenes consisting of spheres. It renders ambient and diffuse light, although reflected light produces some bugs still. It may look dull, but this was the most challenging yet rewarding project from my school career.
